MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G69 postcode area of Glasgow. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 2.55pm. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of a repair required to an underground cable located on Greentree Drive and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 9.30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5:34PM on Sunday 03 January 2021.
